website_summaries.verdict: A combination of easy assembly, affordability, and entertainment makes this activity jumper a hit with both parents and babies.
pros: Well priced and easy to set up
Lots of brightly colored toys to stimulate and draw attention
Light up piano features adjustable volume, 3 music modes, key tones, and educational language settings
Rotating seat with adjustable height for extended use
cons: Some parents find it doesn't fold flat enough for convenient storage

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it! My LO is so engaged with all the different songs and lights on the keyboard, there's language and shapes and notes as well. The tumbler with the mirror is a hit too. It takes up a little less space than our Graco swing and fits through a doorway sideways. They suggest two people put it together but it is doable alone it's just really hard. The instructions are very clear and concise.
customer_reviews.author: jadeski241

customer_reviews.title: Beware Scratches and Lettering Rubs Off Easily
customer_reviews.text: Out of box and it was already scratched and dinged. Possible return then shipped to me? First thing I noticed lettering had rubbed off. I don’t know but I am sure my 4 month will probably do more damage than UPS did! Took about 20-25 minutes to install. You have to read th directions or you will fail miserably. Soon as I get my LO in this after his nap I’ll update my review!
customer_reviews.author: R. P.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Beware if your baby moves around a lot. My 8 month old is 16lbs and today he reached forward for a toy that fell on the ground while in this jumper and he flipped forward slamming his head on the ground while his feet remained stuck in the seat. I will never put him in this again.
customer_reviews.author: ElishaC

customer_reviews.title: The assembling is extremely easy I didn't even have to use the instructions because ...
customer_reviews.text: The assembling is extremely easy I didn't even have to use the instructions because it was too obvious how it was supposed to go the only secret is that I've learned with putting it together is make sure you take the seat off first and when it comes to the straps make sure all of them are to the highest level of setting or it will be hell putting the straps completely through the only downside I have seen when my baby is jumping the piece of fabric holding the two poles together up top they loosen
customer_reviews.author: Heather larson

customer_reviews.title: Vague directions
customer_reviews.text: The black and white illustrated instructions without words are the absolute stupidest, most frustrating thing ever. I spent 30 years reading blueprints and I could not have been more frustrated trying to put together a Neighborhood Friends Activity Center based on the boneheaded decision not to write down, in English, what steps to follow and how to put something together. You may as well include audio instructions in a Khoisan language. That would have been easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G.

customer_reviews.title: Only buy new box
customer_reviews.text: It came filthy dirty with spit up all over it and used I was just going to clean it because I needed it the weekend but I couldn’t get another one in time. I decided to put batteries in it to see if it even worked and it already had batteries and it did not work. So I sent it back :( Package was damaged as stated but was supposed to be new :(
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Sweo

customer_reviews.title: He has enjoyed it so much we just bought one for our ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 'THE BEST', we bought our grandson one of these at 2 months, he's 8 months and still loves it. Bouncy, Bouncy, Bouncy! He has enjoyed it so much we just bought one for our nephew who's 2 months old! We know he will get lots of use out of it. And it's a lifesaver too! Need to cook dinner or any other project, they will sit in it and play self entertained for around an hour or so. Recommendation would be "what are you waiting on, order you one now!"
customer_reviews.author: Itzwendy

customer_reviews.title: Instructions suck / product great
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are very difficult to follow..you're better off using it as a guide while using the picture on the box to figure out what goes where. The instruction manual should really be modified, put it in color..label the pieces..provide a link to a video..something. The worst part is putting the buckles through the slots on the seat, which is kind of scary because someone's child could get hurt if they don't figure out how to do that correctly. We figured it out, and our son is loving it. He's a little small, so we tuck a blanket behind him but he loves all the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Good but it doesn't compact for storage like the info/picture implies
customer_reviews.text: This is great - we got it for my 6 month old. However, don't let it fool you when it says it easily flattens for storage - that's the whole reason I chose this one - it only flattens like the picture if you disassemble it in part. It's annoying. The picture and info make it sound like it folds up nicely, but that's not the case at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shenandoah Hage

customer_reviews.title: chair does not spin. returned! and to collapse ...
customer_reviews.text: chair does not spin. returned! and to collapse the product, you are basically taking it apart. it doesn't fold down as is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have very much "bounce" at all. Even now ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have very much "bounce" at all. Even now my baby is 8 months old, he still can hardly bounce in this- the springs are way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let them burn that energy!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this bouncer!! He's 6 months & has been playing in it since he was 4 months. He's slowly starting to really notice all the activities and will spin to get to each of them. I also have extra toys hanging off the hooks on the bars just so he has to learn to reach. The assembly was a little difficult though. While I was able to assemble *most* of it alone, getting the seat attached to the springs was definitely a *2* person job. One person needs to hold the seat while someone else feeds the spring through it.
customer_reviews.author: HibiscusCutie05

customer_reviews.title: Best jumper!!
customer_reviews.text: At 17 month old my daughter Was able to reach the floor in this jumper. Now at 19 weeks she still loves it and will bounce for hours. It turns 360 degrees to each different station. There’s tabs to hang more toys too. Her legs have become so strong! She’ll be walking in no time! Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Dearborn

customer_reviews.title: Good while it was interesting
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this at first, but got bored and did not want to be any more in it after a while. So my advice is to buy this, but keep your expectations at bay. Any toy that you give a child it is always a bet, you never know which ones they will actually like. But the quality is actually nice, it is colourful, loud and sturdy. But NEVER leave your child unattended in one of those things.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jumpy!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good about this jumpy! My grandson loves it so much he has one at home and at my house. Keeps him busy and safe while I’m cooking or doing chores. It’s pretty big but I move it from the den to the kitchen frequently so not too heavy. I ordered an “open box” an I only paid $45 instead of the $99 actual price. The box was actually still factory sealed but had like a one inch hole in the side, if that’s an open box I’ll be looking for more deals like that!
customer_reviews.author: Christa wright

customer_reviews.title: Stable and fun for kids! Just a bit on the bulky side
customer_reviews.text: our baby boy loves this Activity Jumper. Its a bit on the bulky side but its a stable jumper for a baby. The seat swivels around 360 so that they can enjoy all the activities and toys. With 3 height adjustment options it grows with your baby as he grows in length. Really nice product! my only downside to this which makes it a 4 star rather than a 5 star is that i wish there was an easier way to fold it down or make it more compact so that we can move it from room to room without maneuvering it through doorways in awkward angles. Other than that, great jumper for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin lacerna

customer_reviews.title: Best Bouncer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bouncer on the market! I've tried several in the past and used some from friends, but this one has it all. There are lots of toys that my babies love, and I love the piano toy that plays classical music. This keeps my babies entertained longer than any other toy. Plus its a great workout for their little legs bouncing around. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samolly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t jump!! Way to stiff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was going to be a jumper as product name says for my moms house. However this is the stiffest jumper I have seen. My daughter cannot get this thing to move. I have another jumper which is the Rainforest one and my daughter loves it. So disappointed and I would have returned but I had got rid of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great transitional item for baby development
customer_reviews.text: We got this item when our baby was around 5 months. This item is a great transitional item for when your little one is starting to become more mobile. It great for strength if your little ones legs. This item is also adjustable up and down for height needs. Chair does full 360 turn. Seat comes out easy for regular washing. Music feature is battery operated but you will only use one set of batteries for this item. Assembly was very user friendly. It took maybe 5-10 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mama-to-a-Gem

customer_reviews.title: This does NOT collapse easily for storage
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Seems to be well made, with lots of entertainment possibilities. Could have better instructions, the pictures are fine, but a few "words" would of been nice. My big complaint is, the picture showing it being stored under the bed on the product page is misleading. This does NOT collapse easily for storage. I am only using it 1 day a week and it is very hard for me to disassemble it and reassemble it for each use.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bouncer! Baby girl loves it and can hang out in it for quite a bit, which is great when you have 2 other little ones to tend to as well. She loves the toys around it and plays with all of them and she loves bouncing like crazy as well. I purchased “Like New” from Amazon Warehouse and saved $35; it really was like new and would definitely order that way again to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Case's Shop

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We use to have one with out first born and loved it. I’m glad I was able to find the same concept for our second one. I wasn’t a fan of the other concept I feel this one is sturdy as both of my kiddos figured out what happens when you jump and they go to town and I don’t have to worry about it tipping over. I read it happened a lot on some of the others ones so this one is still by far my favorite one.
customer_reviews.author: Marleny Malone

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing the piano only worked for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this product. My son loved it for the few weeks the music worked. Then the lights would work but no sound. It took me 2 months of weekly calling the company to finally get help, only for them to tell me they cannot send me a replacement piano.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old loves this so much. The colors are bright and welcoming and he bounces up and down with great ease. There are great activities for him to play with and keep him entertained nicely; the red bird and music notes are his favorites. It's especially fun to watch him figure stuff out on his own too. I also love that it is super easy to disassemble for storage, that was really what sold me on this one versus some of the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality jumper. Although it’s rather heavy and takes up a lot of space, my daughter loves this thing!! She cannot get enough of it! She really enjoys the different stations! I love it because she can stay in it longer because I can turn it and trick her to make her think she’s playing with a different toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little activity bouncer
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a sturdy package and the assembly is super easy. The music is great with a small selection of classical musical snippets. The activities on it are engaging for little, growing minds and the colors keep them engaged. My son loves it and helps me get a few extra minutes of peace to clean my house and handle work related tasks without having to hold my son all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz T

customer_reviews.title: this is not  convenient ESPECIALLY  for Grandparents with arthritis...
customer_reviews.text: Bought Jumper thinking the fold feature would be handy because of limited living-room space..BUT it only KINDA folds.. "FOLDING" for storage is done removing the 4 poles, By pushing green lock buttons WHILE pulling the poles out ( it took 2 people) and laying them with the base and seat... I really wanted a bouncy chair or activity station that folds down for easy storage quickly like a pack and play... up and down in one step....this is not convenient ESPECIALLY for Grandparents with arthritis......
customer_reviews.author: Bella Lyle

customer_reviews.title: This is THE BEST thing thus far that we have purchased for our ...
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST thing thus far that we have purchased for our little one! He loves it. Got it for him at 4 months, he is now 8 months and still loves it! Definitely worth the money. We also travel a lot so it breaks down fairly easy but it is still a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Crtnix

customer_reviews.title: Had to get this for our second boy, the first boy loved his.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We were given one by a friend for our first baby boy and then donated that first one to some other friends. Now that we have a new baby boy (lil' brother) we decided to stick with a known good and purchased this exact same model. The cool part is that the seat/chair can be lowered or raised so it grows with them to some degree. We love it and so have our boys. It'd say the only downside is that is does take up some space so it might not be the best fit for a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this around the time my son turned 4 months old. He has always had good head control and was working on being a supported sitter. He loves this. At first he just played with the piano part, but now (6 months) he bounces like crazy and turns in it. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble. My six month granddaughter loves it. This is definitely baby approved. It has six loops on the frame to add your baby’s favorite hanging toys. So much fun for your little one. Her favorite area is the keys that play music. She will push the keys then happily bounce up and down.
customer_reviews.author: K. Langenberg

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old son LOVES his activity center. The seat is stiff but I hope it loosens up as he grows and starts moving it on his own. I also added some of stroller hanging toys with extension clips for more entertainment as this comes with 4 rings (2nd picture) that hang down
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: My 6 mo old twins LOVE this thing. I was worried I wouldn't get $89 worth of use out of it but it had been a godsend. It keeps them quiet long enough to let me get some chores done. I went to a local retail store to compare this one and the similar Fisher Price model and went with this one because it is much lighter and has the ability of 360 deg. rotation. This bouncer is so great, I wish I had bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Claude Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: she likes it just have to break into it. 6m. Update: she bounces alot she broke into it. her legs are so much more powerful and she loves to stand. Plus. it tires her out so she takes nice naps:) i love it i didnt put batteries in the piano AA batteries or else she would be playing it. She cant spin yet but she plays with every section
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for being used.
customer_reviews.text: So so for me. Bought it used lil over haft price. All parts are included some are still in plastic. Box 📦 had a hole. Over all I wasn’t too impress. “Amazon” said like new/used. But can’t complain I did save some money. I think 3star is a good evaluation of this item. In my opinion for me.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham R.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old daughter LOVES this jumper! She gets very happy whenever I put her in it. I am not a handy person, but I was able to put it together myself easily. This jumper keeps her entertained for a while, while also working those little leg muscles. I also love how we can hang a bunch of her favorite toys from it to keep her even more entertained. It's great. I wish I would have purchased this months ago but regardless, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend getting
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and highly recommend. Our little one can easily jump a bit and circle to “new” toys which keeps her entertained for an extended time. It does take up a bit of space and can’t be folded so if you have a smaller apartment or family room you may want to look at other items, but I highly recommend if you have the space to keep it set up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainer but takes up space
customer_reviews.text: Baby loved this from 4-7 months. Currently ignoring it in favor of crawling, but may be just a phase and hoping she will return. Not cheap, but cheaper than a baby-sitter given that the provides up to an hour of hands-free time. Cons: takes up a lot of space and not collapsable. Minor con: languages are randomly English, Spanish, and French - they could just use the memory to play more songs.
customer_reviews.author: Misha Collie

customer_reviews.title: Great piece if you don't have a large arch area ...
customer_reviews.text: Great piece if you don't have a large arch area to attach a moulding hanging bouncer up, but if you do...my baby specifically got over this really quick and prefers to be in the other one to bounce/fly around in. The attached play things didn't keep her entertained as long as I hoped so plan to attach more hanging things to touch and play with ;)
customer_reviews.author: Christina Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Grows with baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this! He's about 3 months old now and is able to sit up a bit and focus on the toys. I like the option to hang toys from the top for the younger babies who are all about observing. It's a handy, entertaining, safe place to set my baby for a few minutes while I grab a bite to eat and will grow with him as he becomes more interested in the world around him.
customer_reviews.author: Raidee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my baby was just 4 months, in the beginning he wasn’t into it a lot. He could play for 3-5 minutes and get tired of it but now my baby is 5 months he is loving it he will stay in for 15-20 minutes at a time and really enjoy it. Worth the money and the best part of it is you can use it until your baby starts to walk. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dardan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Baby plays well in it and keeps her occupied. One side just doesn't make sense to me though. Baby doesn't like it she would rather have little hooks in hand than attached. Also the whole it folds down is crap. You have to take it apart and make it flat. Had I known I wouldn't of bought. But we still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Duryion Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Bounce Bounce Bounce
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old absolutely loves this. Received it in its original package brand new. Extremely easy to assemble and dismantle. We travel a lot and the ease of taking this apart makes this an easy item to take along. BATTERIES no incuded but double A batteries are easy to come by. Great price for a great item.... SATISFIED
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I got this was so my 5 month old daughter could turn around and explode the different toys. Unfortunately this item is cheaply built and she cannot turn it alone. I can turn it for her when she is in it but that defeats the purpose. Toys on it are subpar. Not sure if there is a better one out there but this one was quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Open box terrible
customer_reviews.text: Bought open box one. Delivered with one side completely open. Big chunk cardboard missing bottom corner of box and box was in horrible shape. Missing instructions and one of the pieces you attach to top bars. One of spinners on seat barely moved and seat impossible to turn. Spinning bead thing was covered in what looked like formula and had scratches on it. Top of yellow flower damaged. Springs streched out. Don't know quality of brand new one,but open box like new was terrible disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Great little bouncer for our baby. She loves all the activities. She especially likes that little rings to be able to attach our own toys for her to play with. I like that the sway turns for her and she can jump and it’s adjustablw. My only complaint is that her arm can get caught between the one bar when she’s turning in the seat. It has only happened once.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this bouncer. My daughter loves it and keeps her entertained for a while. Now she is 14 months and actually likes to try to climb up into it which she enjoys. lol. so we're still getting good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quaility, sturdy and durable. Lots of fun things to keep your baby/toddler busy. Purchased five years ago for my granddaughter and just passed kn to my granddaughter. Cover is washable and didn't fade. Still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Carlee

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our young son, and I love it! Setting it up was super easy, and I love that it's adjustable. It was just low enough for him to sit in it at 6 months on the lowest setting. The noises it makes aren't super annoying, which is nice and, I'm finding, a rarity among children's toys.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL STURDY BABY LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 month old. He absolutely loves it. And my 2 year old constantly crawls in it and plays away with it and it hasn't broken. I've had this about 3 months and I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great Activity Jumper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great-granddaughter. She loves it. She loves all the different items to play with and they can be interchanged with whatever you have on hand. Great leg strengthener. Durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Hanes

customer_reviews.title: The baby einstein jumper was one of my babies favorite toys. It was one of the few things ...
customer_reviews.text: The baby einstein jumper was one of my babies favorite toys. It was one of the few things that would keep him entertained long enough to get anything done around the house. At 18 months he still likes to push the musical buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves and and she loves it more as ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves and and she loves it more as she gets older! We put her in it at 2 months but her feet didnt really touch but now they are starting too and she likes it more. She still doesn't really jump but loves the toys and music !
customer_reviews.author: Breana

customer_reviews.title: My son will miss it
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years, it still looks like new. Very sturdy. I’m selling it now, but my son still likes to play with it. It has music, numbers, and shapes. Surprisingly, he was very active, so didn’t use it as much as little, but more so later!
customer_reviews.author: Asta

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hates to be away from me. I have been trying everything to have her have, what I call “baby time”. This has helped me so much! The first day she was in it for about two minutes and I was worried. After a little time each day more time added she loves this. Mind you my daughter is about to be 4 months old so this has helped me so much to clean and make dinner and have “mommy arm rest time” lol! Love this! Will be ordering to get my sister one for her new baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while for the springs to be "broken in" ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while for the springs to be "broken in" ... but it does the trick. you may have to play with the setting too, make sure your baby isn't leaning forward. We put the front settings a notch higher and she was straight. Not sure why - but it works.
customer_reviews.author: IndyJones125

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Seems more sturdy than other jumpers on the market. Used it with my 7 month old and he loves being able to jump and bounce. It is holding up with his bouncing and he isnt a light jumper.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Best one !
customer_reviews.text: Colorful, well .made, sturdy and loads of fun For baby . Bought this for gift as I was already familiar with activity jumpers in past having other brands and this one prior when operated a daycare couple years prior.. This is the best one
customer_reviews.author: Linda zebrowski

customer_reviews.title: Baby LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about a month now. My baby absolutely LOVES it. (He was 5 months when we got it and now is 6 months.) He is sooo happy jumping and playing in it and will stay in it for about 20 minutes, which is awesome because then he is happy and occupied while I cook dinner, do dishes, etc. It seems sturdy and likely to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MaKenna

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: If you ever purchased furniture from ikea and struggled with the picture instructions, you are I. For a treat. The instructions were confusing but with the help of youtube we got it done. This was love at first site for my niece. She couldn’t get enough of it. She bounced and focused in on all the toy parts. Overall the happiness of the baby is all that mattered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... loves this jumparoo and we had just as much fun watching her learn how to use it
customer_reviews.text: My picky niece absolutely loves this jumparoo and we had just as much fun watching her learn how to use it. The laughter it caused for her, and us, when she finally got the hang of it is priceless. I love how deep the seat is which allowed her to doze off comfortably. One tip, if it's placed on carpet, make sure your little one has socks on or they will end up with rug burn or their little piggies!
customer_reviews.author: Shadowlily

customer_reviews.title: Put this on your registry list. NOW.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I loved anything as much as my daughter loves this jumper. We will probably buy a second one for her grandparents house because she goes through jumping withdrawals when we visit. This lovely piece of equipment has allowed me some hands free time to shower, do dishes, cook, and genuinely gain a little sanity.
customer_reviews.author: GBaldwin

customer_reviews.title: Stiff when child is jumping but has many interactive toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I saw the price, the toys that are on it and seeing other friends post pics of it with their little ones. Has been a great toy for months however my only disappointment is as its a jumperoo it's a bit tight when child is jumping. He will jump and it's very stiff with jumping with him, it's also very large especially at the bottoms. Other then that, it's a great jumperoo!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Happy Baby!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must for a baby! My grandson loves his freedom in this. He’s 5 months old and is easily entertained jumping or just playing with the attached toys. So happy when he’s in this. Also a very good quality product, it is extremely well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of baby's favorite toys
customer_reviews.text: He loves Baby Einsteins Jumper. He can play in this toy for at least 10-15 minutes by himself, which gives mommy enough time to get the crockpot going.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5 stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together & looks very fun! Lots of activities & my 5 year old even enjoyed helping her little brother play & discover all the toys & sounds. My only complaint is that at 4 1/2 months my son couldn’t touch the floor even with it on the lowest setting. So he just dangles.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product my 4 month old loves it she has great head control would say if you little one does not have good head control to wait until they do because there is nothing on this to help with that.
customer_reviews.author: felicia

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves this bouncer! She enjoys the music and the variety of activities. We looked at a bunch of different ones, my husband picked this one, and we're really happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby son loves this thing! He really got into it when he was around 8 months old.
customer_reviews.author: AJ J.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Our twins love this thing!! They love jumping and there are so many activities. They enjoy twisting the seat around while grasping everything in sight. The bright colors are appealing and I love the music and the numbers in different languages are a nice touch. We love this jumper!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke03

customer_reviews.title: Does not Fold but Does Entertain
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this model instead of the newer model because the description said it easily folded away. It does not. The only way to "fold" it is to dissemble the jumper. Other than though my infant loves it and it's a great distraction for when I need her to stay in one place while I cook.
customer_reviews.author: WDG

customer_reviews.title: BABY LOVES THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to safely let baby explore and exercise! Started using at 4 months and our baby still enjoys at 10 months! She loves the music and jumping!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs PJD

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grand and she is sooo happy with it. At five months old, it is great for working her legs as she is getting close to crawling.
customer_reviews.author: H Dorn

customer_reviews.title: the activities are great and it's not too big and clunky to move ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star if it had a removable base for baby's legs. Our baby's not quite tall enough for even the lowest setting so we stack blankets underneath it, but it moves around. Otherwise, the activities are great and it's not too big and clunky to move around. Easy to assemble too!
customer_reviews.author: Chantrey

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this jumper, though he has a hard time reaching one of the three toys attached to it. There is also hooks to hang toys from the sides which I like. Had a bit of a difficult time putting together, but was able to figure it out. It was also missing a part on the base, but I contacted them via email and had the part within the week. No questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: tmc200

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Maybe not the easiest of jumpers to have set up but its cute and fun. I would definitely team effort getting the cords into the sitting part. It was a challenge for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Baby Einstein jumper and I would suggest it to anyone. It is very entertaining for babies and I had to buy a second one because my older children broke the first one from trying to sit in it all of the time but it is very durable for a baby. This is a great toy if you are looking for a bouncing jumper for a child. My babies have all loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Mama

customer_reviews.title: My 5 month old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars - Love that you can attach your own toys to it with links! I like how you can adjust the height to it to fit baby as they grow. My baby favorite thing so far with all her toys in reach, hanging all around her. The piano is fun, speaks in other languages too!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Roehl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Lots of things to do. Had one similar, that model discontinued, this one was as close as I could get. Easily adjustable, light weight enough to move around, but very sturdy. My granddaughter LOVES it, and her parents don't complain about it! Total win!
customer_reviews.author: Shonna B

customer_reviews.title: A great jumper!
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these with our other two kids but gave it away when we thought we were done. We just had a welcome surprise baby and we were excited to see that this toy is still available 10 years later!
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful great buy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful love love love this my son uses it everyday really nice that it adjusts for growth. I love that you have different options for the piano to sing, count or just play the notes. And love that you can control the volume. I do wonder why one side of it doesn't have a toy for it but it looks like a toy should be there.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: It's not collapsible, it must be taken apart to store & it's rather large.
customer_reviews.text: My baby LOVES this jumper. However, it's not very bouncy & this little girl loves to bounce. She's in it more for surrounding activities. I knocked it down a star because it is NOT convenient for storage. It's not foldable, you have to take it apart to store it. It's big, if you have a place to keep it without needing to store it away, this is a great activity seat.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: Item defective. Seat cushion thst baby sits in is missing 2 latches that are just not there. Makes it not safe and completely unusable. Need new seat attachment stat but no customer service willing to send it to me asap
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy yet light enough to move from room to room ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 month old grandson. He loves it. Its has so many things to to see an busy him. It is sturdy yet light enough to move from room to room or outside. It has been a great purchase for us. I would recommend this activity center.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Catlett

customer_reviews.title: Challenging to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jumper. I would have given it five stars but the directions are terrible, it took two adults over 2 hours to assemble. I would like to see directions in color so it is easier to tell what goes where. I'd be willing to pay the extra dollar to have better directions.
customer_reviews.author: B. B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old granddaughter is liking this a lot. She's a little girl so can't quite reach the spinny frog well, but she's learning about the other things she can reach. I love that you can hang other things from the multiple hooks. Gives more options.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: A must get for energetic babies/kids
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! So cute and colorful. My little girl jumps and squeals because she is so excited to be even within a few feet from this. We had another jumper which was actually rated #2 but the springs were so tight she barely could jump. This one she is able to move and go to town.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I usually love baby Einstein products, but Springs are so tight it barely bounces. My son jumps very well in the type of jumper that fits on the door, but can barely make this move. Toys are too far to reach, and seat is to tight to rotate.
customer_reviews.author: s and nonna

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Had this jumper for both of my kids and it is seriously the best I would pick this jumper every time for my kids!
customer_reviews.author: jamie Nicole leach

customer_reviews.title: Great for jumpers
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved bouncing so she was thrilled to start jumping in this! I also loved that as she grew a little bit I could change the height, got more use out of it, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: The jump is limited
customer_reviews.text: This is not my favorite jumper. It is too tight and my eight-month-old cannot jump in it. There's not enough give. I do like how you get attached other toys all around it and that's really nice. The batteries seem to last for a while. It's very colorful but it takes up a lot of space. I would not buy this item again knowing what I know
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and the full package
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one (I sold mine right before I realized I was pregnant again). We tried others and ended up getting old faithful. Nothing could compare, so we finally went with our first inclination. We shouldn’t have even wasted time with any others. The only reason we tried was because they didn’t have these in store anymore. Worth the wait. It’s way sturdier than any other and it’s the full package.
customer_reviews.author: Lavonne Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this jumper. It is very sturdy when the baby jumps. It was easy to put together and keeps her busy while I am busy.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Saechao

customer_reviews.title: This is a great jumper. It took my son a while to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jumper. It took my son a while to get excited about it but once he did he wanted to bounce all the time. I would say that if you have a real child they may outgrow this rather quickly. My son is tall for his age and is already flat footed in this product even though he has yet to meet the weight limit. It's perfect for entertainment for babies around 6 months old
customer_reviews.author: Aeriell

customer_reviews.title: What in the world???
customer_reviews.text: It’s missing a whole bag of parts! No fabric seat, no wheels for seat, seat carrier, Montana links or music links. So I was told to contact baby Einstein they’re closed so I sent an email.. up to five days for a reply
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wirta

customer_reviews.title: and loved it from the first time she was placed in ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loves this. So helpful to keep her occupied. She was 7 months old when we bought the jumper, and loved it from the first time she was placed in it! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mattmeg

customer_reviews.title: Loves the bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, makes noises there’s toys on there it’s for boys or girls keeps them interacted for hours this is a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Payton

customer_reviews.title: Unuseable due to missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas and attempted to set it up for him to play with. The set was missing critical pieces to set it up and is completely unuseable. Contacting the company to try to get the missing pieces but it's a hassle and my child it without a Christmas gift. Will not order from baby Einstein in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Hayman

customer_reviews.title: Great Jump Jump
customer_reviews.text: Looked at a of jump jumps. This is perfect for price and activities. My baby loves playing in his. I can also clip more toys onto it. It's easy to wipe down and clean the seat. When he is sitting in it he can easily turn to the different parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie N Blair

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great jumper. It has plenty of activities to keep little one busy and the adjustable heights allows it to grow with baby. And we got it on sale so bonus for price!
customer_reviews.author: RAcred

product_meta.title: Baby Einstein Neighborhood Friends Activity Jumper with Lights and Melodies
product_meta.description: Style:Neighborhood FriendsThe Baby Einstein Neighborhood Friends activity jumper will captivate your baby like no other activity jumper can. With 360 degrees of multi-sensory activities, your baby can swivel and play every which way. The activity center features 3 Play stations and more than 12 activities to explore. The light-up piano lets your baby compose their first Musical masterpiece, while the spinning frog bead chaser encourages hand-eye coordination. With extra link loops, you can add your baby's favorite toys or swap out new playful friends so entertainment is always in reach. The baby bounce chair allows your little one to jump and dance, which helps strengthen their developing leg muscles. With no doorways required, you can watch your baby safely play and grow wherever you need to be. From music appreciation to language introduction, this award-winning Baby Einstein jumper turns the idea of a baby bouncer into an imaginative world of discovery.
feature_bullets: Captivates & cultivates your baby’s curiosity through 12 interactive activities with lights, songs, and sounds
Five easily-adjustable height positions to grow with baby
Introduces new languages (English, Spanish & French) and promotes language development
Fun and discovery come full circle with 360-degree seat rotation
Toy stations wipe clean with a damp cloth; seat cover is machine washable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,117 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
